name: OCEAN FINANCE LTD
membership: Ocean Finance's Managing Director Mr. Zacharioudakis Panagiotis participates in the "Marine LNG Network" including ship owners, bunker suppliers, classification societies, port authorities and energy companies. It aims to spread knowledge and exchange best practices for implementing successfully LNG bunkering in Greece.
goal: Ocean Finance Ltd acts as investment house in maritime industry and energy, while it provides strategic and financial consulting and business development services and software solutions. It is active in the Energy sector specializing in the Liquefied natural gas (LNG) market and its applications to the shipping industry.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Ocean Finance Ltd has participated in the following:
-Connecting Europe Facility (CEF) of European Commission
-Environmental policies involving Air emissions
-European Sustainable Shipping Forum (ESSF)-European Commission
-Development of Detailed Implementation Plan for Motorways of the Sea (MOS) reference to Ocean Finance Ltd's affiliated company Europa Venture
